properties.entry: SELECT A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_NATIONAL, MOVIE_GRADE, LISTAGG(GENRE, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY GENRE) AS GENRE FROM MOVIE_INFORMATION_TABLE A, GENRE B, GENRE_MOVIE C WHERE A.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO AND B.GENRE_NO = C.GENRE_NO GROUP BY A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE,MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_NATIONAL, MOVIE_GRADE
SELECT MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_GRADE, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_NATIONAL, MOVIE_NO FROM MOVIE_INFORMATION_TABLE JOIN GENRE_MOVIE USING(MOVIE_NO) JOIN GENRE USING(GENRE_NO) WHERE GENRE = ?
SELECT MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_GRADE, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_NATIONAL, MOVIE_NO FROM MOVIE_INFORMATION_TABLE WHERE MOVIE_GRADE = ?
SELECT MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_GRADE, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_NATIONAL, MOVIE_NO FROM MOVIE_INFORMATION_TABLE WHERE MOVIE_NATIONAL = ?
